description:
Satoshi, Goh and Koharu are visiting a Pokémon Center, where the naughty Sarunori and Eievui are constantly keeping them on their toes. Goh and Koharu insist their Pokémon are good kids, and Satoshi decides to help out by suggesting they give the Pokémon duo an errand to run. Will their first errand go smoothly?
Source: wikipedia

titles.title: はじめてのおつかい見守りたいっ!
